QuestData.Title: Hellfire Fortifications
QuestData.Description: The fel orcs of Hellfire Citadel must be scoured from our birthland! To attack them, we must first secure forward staging points near the Citadel.$B$BOur outrunners found three fortifications that will suit this purpose, but the Alliance has the same idea and even now sends forces to take them!$B$BWe want you to stop the Alliance and capture these forts. Aid in the capture of each fort and then return to me.$B$BFor the Horde!
QuestData.LogDescription: Capture the Overlook, the Stadium and Broken Hill, then return to Battlecryer Blackeye in Thrallmar.
QuestData.CompletionText: Return to me after you have helped capture each fort!
QuestData.RewardText: Nice work, $N. I could almost hear the battles waged at those forts. I wish I was there to see them!
